name: Dragon Hunter game
description:
Dragon Hunter

Enjoy the dragon hunter ice
Welcome to dragon hunter ice, more powerful arrow,refined crab boss, more levels Want to be a dragon hunter?
It is one-to-one battle between the player and monsters that appear successively and the accurate beating is player’s magic weapon.
Attack dragons to guard your castle. The humanity waits for the Lord of the Dragons!
Dynamic hi-def 3D Graphics and realistic models all combine to make this one of the most amazing Dragon shooter FPS game.

key features:

- Realistic 3D graphics
- awesome sound effects
- easy to control
